snippet: Mr. Sweat was released from Albany Medical Center early Sunday morning and transferred to the Five Points Correctional Facility, a maximum-security prison in Romulus, N.Y.
abstract: David Sweat, prison escapee who has been under care at Albany Medical Center since being wounded during his capture in upstate New York, is released to Five Points Correctional Facility in Romulus, NY; following medical evaluation, Sweat will be transferred to solitary confinement at the maximum security facility, and placed on suicide watch.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sweat was released from Albany Medical Center early Sunday morning and transferred to the Five Points Correctional Facility, a maximum-security prison in Romulus, N.Y.

headline.main: David Sweat, Escaped Convict, Is Released From Hospital and Transferred to Upstate Prison
headline.print_headline: Escapee Is Released From Hospital and Transferred to an Upstate Prison
